|kanji=鮫肌でぶっとばされるサダメさ!
|unnamed jutsu=No
|romaji=Samehada de Buttobasareru Sadame sa!
|literal english=Shark Skin's Gonna Shank Ya!
|jutsu classification=Taijutsu, Kenjutsu

B begins with a a couple kicks, before standing on one hand and spinning, kicking his opponent with both legs as he does so, and also striking them with one of his [[Kumogakure Swords|swords]] in his other hand. Using the momentum of the spin, B gets back up and attacks the opponent three times with [[Samehada]].
